scheme_detail.name: Tanishq Logo
scheme_detail.caption: Start a fixed installment for 10 months, get a discount of 75% of installment amount

whatsthis.title: What is this?
whatsthis.description: This is a monthly planned purchase plan offered by Tanishq through Tortoise. Payments have to be made monthly, on the same date as the first installment, with a 7 day grace period. Payments have to be made monthly, on the same date as the first installment, with a 7 day grace period. Payments have to be made monthly, on the same date as the first installment.

userReviews.review: This helped us realize our dream of buying diamond jewelery without feeling any heat, anxiety about pooling of money for such a big ticket purchase.

benefits.description: Club with any other existing offer
Applicable on any Tanishq product, at any store across India

terms.caption: Redeemable 366 to 400 days from the first installment date, by buying jewellery from any Tanishq store in the country.

schemeVerification.title: This is a Verified Tanishq Plan
schemeVerification.caption: This means that this plan is officially supported and endorsed by Tanishq Jewellers and is not through any third party platform.

items.question: What are the available payment options?
items.answer: We currently offer only UPI based payments. You can pay via Google Pay, PayTM, Stripe, or any other UPI based payment app of your choice.

items.question: Can I change my instalment amount after enrollment?
items.answer: We currently offer only UPI based payments. You can pay via Google Pay, PayTM, Stripe, or any other UPI based payment app of your choice.
